title: The clock is ticking for your Fitbit account, Google logins to start next week
description: It's currently unknown if you'll need to update your Fitbit app.

title: This rare Sonos Sale brings savings of up to $340 on top audio
description: If the premium Sonos audio devices are normally beyond your budget, you can save 25% in this wide-ranging sale.

title: Amazon might be getting into the phone service game, but is it a good idea?
description: Amazon Prime phone service could be a thing in the future, so claims one report.

title: After 3 years with a Chromecast, I just want Nvidia to make a new Shield TV
description: NVIDIA is a trillion-dollar company now. It can surely spare a few millions on a new Shield TV project. (Please?)

title: Check out the best war movies on Netflix in 2023
description: With titles in different genres and from different decades, there's a war movie for everyone.

title: Oof, some Pixel Watch units are randomly popping open
description: Many affected users have been able to claim a replacement under warranty.

title: Poll: What would make you buy a foldable phone?
description: What improvement would make you buy a foldable phone? Let us know in our latest poll!

title: Android 14 makes it possible to check your phone’s battery health
description: The feature needs some permissions through ADB, but we hope it becomes easily accessible in future releases.

title: Looking for a rugged phone? The Nokia XR21 is now available in the US
description: Got butter fingers or work in a rough field? The Nokia XR21 might be for you.

title: Samsung finally confirms blurry S23, S23 Plus cameras, says a fix is coming
description: The company has also issued a few workarounds, such as stepping back before taking a snap.

title: Snapdragon Summit 2023 confirmed: Here’s when to expect Snapdragon 8 Gen 3
description: Qualcomm usually announces new flagship silicon at the Snapdragon Summit each year.
